item.title: DeepQuali: Determining Software Quality with AI
item.description: DeepQuali is an AI-powered “co-pilot” that helps developers quickly spot issues, anti-patterns, and improvement opportunities in software architecture beyond what traditional metrics reveal.

item.title: MLOps for everyone: A universal MLOps-Blueprint based on Kubeflow
item.description: In this article we present the QAware concept of an MLOps Blueprint.

item.title: Software Circus
item.description: The most interesting topics we experienced during this year’s Software Circus include AI/ Machine Learning, Software Architecture, DevOps.
